function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Surfaces retaining viruses can become frequent touch points","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and infection in the workplace","Mitigation":"Reduce the frequency of touch points and increase awareness of infection risk","Technologies":"Antiviral coatings, disinfection technologies","People":"Workers, building occupants","Owner":"Facility management, building administrators"},{"Description":"Microbiological contaminants in water tanks during building closures","Impact":"Health hazards for building occupants due to microbiological contaminants in water","Mitigation":"Regular inspection and maintenance of water tanks, treatment of water systems","Technologies":"Water quality monitoring systems, disinfection technologies","People":"Building occupants, facility management","Owner":"Facility management, building administrators"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and adherence to COVID-19 safety precautions in workplaces","Impact":"Increased risk of infection due to lack of adherence to safety precautions","Mitigation":"Regular communication of safety guidelines, enforcement of protocols, and employee motivation","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing technologies","People":"Office employees, workplace visitors","Owner":"Office administrators, workplace management"}]}
